mapper.select: select board_no,m.mem_nickname,board_kinds,board_title,board_date,board_hit,board_content,board_head from board_post b, member_info m where b.mem_no = m.mem_no order by board_no
mapper.update: update board_post set board_kinds=#{board_kinds}, board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_copy=#{board_copy}, board_head=#{board_head} where board_no=#{board_no}
